goal: Reduce the opponent’s Health from 20 to 0.

keywords.on_deploy: Triggers when the Unit enters the battlefield.
keywords.taunt: Enemy attacks must target a Taunt Unit; leftmost Taunt is attacked first.
keywords.adrenaline: Triggers once at the start of each Battle Phase.
keywords.affinity: Activates if you control a Unit of the specified Faction.

merging.description: One Unit merges into another friendly Unit.
merging.effect: Target gains attack and health of merging Unit.
merging.example: A(3/2) merges into B(4/5) → B becomes 7/7.

rules: Units attack the opposing Unit in the same slot.
Damage is one-sided; attackers do not take damage.
If opposing board is smaller, extra Units attack the rightmost enemy Unit.
If no enemy Units, attacks hit opponent directly.
Units destroyed mid-battle stop acting immediately.

additional_rules.hand_size_overflow: If drawing beyond 10, the card is discarded.
additional_rules.full_board: Cannot play Units if board is full unless a card allows it.
additional_rules.board_rearrangement: Units shift to fill gaps when a Unit dies.

glossary.unit: A card with Attack, Health, Faction, and Abilities.
glossary.slot: A space on the battlefield for a Unit.
glossary.merge: Combining one Unit into another, adding stats.
glossary.board_rearrangement: Units auto-shift to fill gaps upon death.
glossary.priority: Determines which player’s effects resolve first.
